Subskills.name: Agile Zapper
Subskills.description: Increases the frequency of chain lightnings.

Subskills.name: Zapping Force
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by storm dash.

Subskills.name: Lightning Trail
Subskills.description: Leave behind a trail of lightning inflicting electrified and lightning break.

Subskills.name: Bouncing Current
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of chain lightning bounces.

Subskills.name: Thunderfall
Subskills.description: Chain lightning has a chance to call down a thunderbolt on the target dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Hopping Surge
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum range of storm dash.

Subskills.name: Landing Surge
Subskills.description: When landing unleash a lightning explosion for additional area of effect damage and stunning on hit.

Subskills.name: Lightning Strikes
Subskills.description: Unleash lightning strikes on nearby monsters when landing.

Subskills.name: Pillar of Storm
Subskills.description: Leave behind a pillar of storm. Pillars of storm are linked with a chain of lightning dealing damage and inflicting stasis on hit.

Subskills.name: Electric Current
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Agility Over Power
Subskills.description: You can now travel through terrain but the damage of storm dash is reduced.

Subskills.name: Storm Orbs
Subskills.description: Landing on monsters summons lightning bolts orbiting around you continuously zapping nearby monsters with chain lightning. Storm dash now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Storm Gates
Subskills.description: Blink to target location summoning a lightning storm unleashing chain lightning on hit.
